title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
description: Ferris Bueller is a popular high school student living in an affluent Chicago suburb. After convincing his parents that he is truly sick, Ferris calls on his friend Cameron to join him for a day of hooky from school. Cameron agrees, reluctantly, because it means taking his father&#039;s prized classic 1961 red Ferrari 250 GT convertible. They pick up Ferris&#039;s girlfriend head for adventure in downtown Chicago -- all the while trying to outsmart and outrun the dean of students who has become wise to Ferris&#039; plan.
